item.description: [[ttrpgs/Pieces of Fate/000 World Index|home]] [[021_20230418]] Session Summary [!tldr] [[021_20230418]] ^summary Recap ![[ttrpgs/Pieces of Fate/020_20230413#^summary]] Log breakfast with Luigi - eggs bacon and hashbrowns Walk uptown, across Stonebridge, into the high city Off to the right, the noble estates off to the left, the Don Jon, the barracks for the royal guard Also a max security prison At the far end is the Star Haven many windows guarded vigilantly by the royal guard The festival Grounds is a large green space (giant park) and used for the Arena of Frun (think olympics) library of the spheres large domed buildings, surrounding a tower Gadaric is often found here Fancy theater Temple district, devoted to various faiths Gadaric traditionally crotchety old wizard man Noble Estates “the bougiest lemonade stands you’ve ever seen” Art or farmers market artisan crafts [[The Fools Errant|The Fools]] stop at a stand with fine clothing.
The Fools finish the fight, and discuss the need for an alliance with the Royals
The Fools Errant fight against members of Ozzy’s gang
The PCs give them selves a name and put on a show
The PCs have dinner at House Sandyfoot
The PCs explore the cavern and fight fungal zombies
The PCs seek the Unknowable One
The PCs go to the Rock of Bral
We finished the fight, saved Hex, and recovered the Stone of Vitality
The PCs fight through the hoard of cultists to stop the ritual
